items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.title: paulgeorge35/hooks: A lightweight TypeScript library that provides a set of commonly used React hooks to enhance your components with powerful functionality. Mainly created for my personal use.

items.content_html: Toast JS is a lightweight and customizable JavaScript library for creating toast notifications. It's designed to be easy to use and flexible, allowing developers to create notifications that fit their web application's design and functionality.
items.title: SoufianoDev/Toast-JS: Toast JS is a lightweight and customizable JavaScript library for creating toast notifications. It's designed to be easy to use and flexible, allowing developers to create notifications that fit their web application's design and functionality.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently. A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.
items.title: nigrosimone/turbo-array: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently.  A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.

items.content_html: A lightweight library to detect support for specific JavaScript features, CSS properties, and ECMAScript versions in the browser.js-feature-detect 是一个用于检测浏览器是否支持特定的 JavaScript 特性、CSS 属性以及 ECMAScript 版本的小型库。它可以帮助开发者确保他们的应用在目标浏览器中能够正确运行，并提供了一种简单的方式来判断当前环境是否满足最低要求
items.title: KonghaYao/js-feature-detect: A lightweight library to detect support for specific JavaScript features, CSS properties, and ECMAScript versions in the browser.js-feature-detect 是一个用于检测浏览器是否支持特定的 JavaScript 特性、CSS 属性以及 ECMAScript 版本的小型库。它可以帮助开发者确保他们的应用在目标浏览器中能够正确运行，并提供了一种简单的方式来判断当前环境是否满足最低要求
